attributes.action: Extend the VAT exemption on PPE during COVID-19
attributes.background: With ever increasing costs we all face and to encourage everyone to do the right thing in protecting themselves and others, PPE will be a part of our life for some time yet. I want the Government to extend the VAT exemption on PPE to April 2021, in the hope that we will all be vaccinated by then!
